title: Mystery Ward
body:
How many wards do you need "unowned" to buy this? The FAQ says it will unlock any ward available, however i keep getting an error when purchasing.
I've only made 6 purchases, so im not at the daily limit.

> What ward skins are in the Mystery Ward Skin box?

> Same deal: any ward that's listed as available in your in-client Collection. Go into your collection and check "Show Unowned" and uncheck "Show Unavailable".

I have 3 "available".

https://i.imgur.com/DvOqsat.png

Also I got this ward from one of the purchases. Didn't think it would be a thing. Thought it was a loot exclusive.

https://i.imgur.com/a5RlZK7.png

replies.body:
This issue should be resolved as of 1330 yesterday. The wards released since the last time mystery wards was made available weren't added to the loot table.
If you're still not able to buy mystery wards let me know.

I was able to unlock the new Pajama Guardian ward, but it still wont allow me to get the Space Lizard or Devil Vulture wards. The Devil Vulture ward is also not in the Ward tab in the Collection, i only see it in the shop.

Also according the the FAQ, I should be able to unlock the Star Guardian Season 2 and the Steel Valkyries ward since it says you can unlock any ward that says Available in collection. I know both of these are supposed to be somewhat exclusive, so maybe a tweaking of the FAQ or removing them from availability in the Collection tab.

Or if they are simply available and not exclusive at all, great for me.

Looking into this:
- Devil Vulture ward does appear in collection, just have to set it to display "All" skins as it doesn't appear to have been assigned to a "Set".
- I have confirmed that neither Space Lizard or Devil Vulture ward are in the loot table for Mystery Wards, and have reported this to the store team.
- The New Horizon (SG2) and Exo (SV) ward skins should not be marked as available in collection, actually quite a few others like this as well. I've compiled a list of wards that should not be marked as available and passed this on to the store team.
any eta on a fix? i just dont what the emporium to close without being able to grab them.
Thanks for waiting, Space Lizard and Devil Vulture wards are now in the mystery ward loot table.
Sorry, no eta on fix yet. Lots of other things cropping up after preseason patch and thanksgiving holidays in NA mean things are hard to get prioritized atm.

I know there have been a few issues around the ward skins, personally none of the legacy ones I got unlocked properly. It's possible your issues are related, or that for whatever reason those wards haven't been added to the loot/redeem/whatever you want to call the list of stuff table for the mystery ward. AFAIK you should still be able to get those two via mystery wards so I suspect it's just some backend wonkiness. Regardless, ticket is probably the way to go.

As for the Popstar ward, as far as I know there aren't any wards you can't get except maybe the hextech ward so there's some nice surprises there.
